## MemoryCookieStore.removeCookies() method

Removes matching cookies from the store. The `path` parameter is optional and if missing, means all paths in a domain should be removed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeCookies(domain: string, path: string, callback: ErrorCallback): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

domain


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The cookie domain to match against.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The cookie path to match against.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

callback


</td><td>

[ErrorCallback](./tough-cookie.errorcallback.md)


</td><td>

A function to call when the cookies have been removed or an error occurs.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
